item.description: A simple web app that retrieves weather data from uploaded trail camera photos to help identify optimal hunting conditions.

item.title: hello, world!
item.description:
Welcome to my new portfolio! I needed a way to showcase my projects and talk about the fun things I’m working on.

I’ve previously used the Django web framework with AWS to host my personal portfolio, but this time I wanted something faster and more content-focused. This site is powered by Hugo and hosted on GitHub Pages.
